title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple API and Docker images.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: First-class LangChain LLM integration that lets you call any model served by a local Ollama instance inside LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official async Python client for the Ollama API; installable via pip and supports chat, generate, embeddings, and pull/push model operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; provides typed wrappers for chat, generate, list, pull, and delete model endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chat, file uploads, markdown, code highlighting, and user management.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example that couples Ollama embeddings with Chroma vector store for question-answering over documents.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord bot that forwards user prompts to a local Ollama instance and streams responses back into Discord threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Rust-based TUI chat client for Ollama with keyboard shortcuts, conversation history, and syntax-highlighted code blocks in the terminal.

title: ollama-nim-sdk
summary: Unofficial Nim language SDK wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports sync/async calls, streaming, and model management.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with chat, generate, and embeddings methods; includes dependency injection helpers for ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and PVC for model cache.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate providing typed REST wrappers for chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints with Tokio-based streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; offers simple methods for chat, generate, pull, and list operations with context cancellation support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Node.js Slack bot using Bolt framework that listens for mentions and replies via a local Ollama instance with per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building local RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container in CI pipelines for testing LLM-dependent code without external calls.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app that starts/stops the Ollama server and lists downloaded models with quick-copy API endpoints.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that adds a sidebar chat powered by a local Ollama model and can insert generated text directly into notes.
